neighbors.name: Thomas Elliott
neighbors.claims: Thomas Elliott is a resident of Elba, NY, listed as a member of the St. Teresa's Pastoral Council (2023-2024) [St. Teresa's Directory](https://core-docs.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/documents/asset/uploaded_file/3524/stteresasofakron/4554402/2024_Parish_Council_Directory.pdf). He receives mail at a PO Box in Elba [St. Teresa's Directory](https://core-docs.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/documents/asset/uploaded_file/3524/stteresasofakron/4554402/2024_Parish_Council_Directory.pdf). While the parcels 16.-1-24 and 16.-1-1.2 appear on Cider Solar project maps, specific ownership by Elliott could not be independently verified in available public exhibits, though his residency in the town is confirmed [Cider Solar Exhibit 4](http://cidersolarfarm.com/assets/pdfs/public_exhibits/Exh_04.pdf) [St. Teresa's Directory](https://core-docs.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/documents/asset/uploaded_file/3524/stteresasofakron/4554402/2024_Parish_Council_Directory.pdf). No public statements regarding development projects were found.
neighbors.influence_justification: Church council member; no other public roles found

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage through local parish connections or direct mail to his PO Box; focus on respecting community character and addressing any potential impacts to his residence or property.

neighbors.name: Gardiner Cemetery
neighbors.claims: Gardiner Cemetery is a historic burial ground located within the private property at 3815 Lockport Road in Elba (Tax Map ID 16.-1-32) [Cider Solar CRAMMP](https://documents.dps.ny.gov/public/Common/ViewDoc.aspx?DocRefId={C07B4093-0000-CF97-987A-11531759BCF5}&DocTitle=Cider%20Solar_CRAMMP_Rev2%20-%20Redacted) [Cider Solar Exhibit 7](http://cidersolarfarm.com/assets/pdfs/public_exhibits/Exh_07_1of2.pdf). The project has developed specific Screen Planting Plans to install vegetative buffers along the southern border of the solar farm and near the cemetery to mitigate visual impacts [Cider Solar CRAMMP](https://documents.dps.ny.gov/public/Common/ViewDoc.aspx?DocRefId={C07B4093-0000-CF97-987A-11531759BCF5}&DocTitle=Cider%20Solar_CRAMMP_Rev2%20-%20Redacted).

approach_recommendations.engage: Coordinate with the property owner of 3815 Lockport Road and town officials to ensure approved vegetative screening is installed and cemetery access is maintained.

neighbors.name: Glennda Boyce
neighbors.claims: Glennda Boyce is the listed owner of parcel 16.-1-1.12 in the Town of Elba, as confirmed by Cider Solar project filings [Cider Solar Exhibit 4](http://cidersolarfarm.com/assets/pdfs/public_exhibits/Exh_04.pdf) [Cider Solar Exhibit 3](http://cidersolarfarm.com/assets/pdfs/public_exhibits/Exh_03.pdf). Public records corroborate her residency in Elba, NY [National Public Data](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/b/glenda-boyce/). No public comments or media references regarding renewable energy development were found for this individual.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach via neighborly introduction; confirm correct name (Glennda Boyce vs Glenda Bloom) and address standard residential concerns regarding viewshed and noise.

neighbors.disambiguation: Original draft name 'Glenda Bloom' was incorrect; official project documents list 'Glennda Boyce' for parcel 16.-1-1.12.
